suggestions.original: To further enhance the color richness, consider incorporating more gradients and shading to add depth and dimension to the elements. Additionally, using a broader spectrum of colors for the background and adding subtle variations in the hues of the fireworks and airplanes can create a more dynamic and visually engaging scene. Experimenting with different color combinations and intensities can also help to highlight key elements and make the artwork even more vibrant.
